--- alter_sequence_restart_counter_with.sql
ALTER SEQUENCE my_sequence RESTART COUNTER WITH 1000
--- AST
&ast.AlterSequence{
  Alter: 0,
  Name:  &ast.Path{
    Idents: []*ast.Ident{
      &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 15,
        NameEnd: 26,
        Name:    "my_sequence",
      },
    },
  },
  Options:            (*ast.Options)(nil),
  RestartCounterWith: &ast.RestartCounterWith{
    Restart: 27,
    Counter: &ast.IntLiteral{
      ValuePos: 48,
      ValueEnd: 52,
      Base:     10,
      Value:    "1000",
    },
  },
  SkipRange:   (*ast.SkipRange)(nil),
  NoSkipRange: (*ast.NoSkipRange)(nil),
}

--- SQL
ALTER SEQUENCE my_sequence RESTART COUNTER WITH 1000
